title: #013 - My Do's & Don'ts of Selling, When Goals Go Wrong & Why I Think You Should Be Alone
itunes:title: #013 - My Do's & Don'ts of Selling, When Goals Go Wrong & Why I Think You Should Be Alone
description:
In this Podcast you’ll learn

 

  • Alex's Do's & Don'ts of selling
  • Advice for budding entrepreneurs
  • How to be flexible with your goals
  • The struggles of work/personal life
  • About the joy of being disconnected
